00-02-01 Vector v√† Kh√¥ng gian Vector B·∫Øt bu·ªôc

B√†i h·ªçc n√†y gi·ªõi thi·ªáu vector, kh√¥ng gian vector, v√† c√°c kh√°i ni·ªám c∆° b·∫£n t·∫°o n·ªÅn t·∫£ng ƒë·ªÉ hi·ªÉu ƒë·∫°i s·ªë tuy·∫øn t√≠nh trong ng·ªØ c·∫£nh t·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a.

Vector v√† Kh√¥ng gian Vector (\(\mathbb{R}^n\))

Vector l√† g√¨?

  • Vector: H√£y nghƒ© v·ªÅ vector nh∆∞ m·ªôt m≈©i t√™n trong kh√¥ng gian, bi·ªÉu di·ªÖn c·∫£ h∆∞·ªõng v√† ƒë·ªô l·ªõn (ƒë·ªô d√†i). V·ªÅ m·∫∑t to√°n h·ªçc, n√≥ l√† m·ªôt danh s√°ch c√≥ th·ª© t·ª± c√°c s·ªë, gi·ªëng nh∆∞ t·ªça ƒë·ªô. V√≠ d·ª•, m·ªôt vector trong kh√¥ng gian 2D c√≥ th·ªÉ l√† \(\mathbf{v} = \begin{pmatrix} 3 \\ 4 \end{pmatrix}\), c√≥ nghƒ©a l√† 3 ƒë∆°n v·ªã d·ªçc theo tr·ª•c x v√† 4 ƒë∆°n v·ªã d·ªçc theo tr·ª•c y.

  • G√≥c nh√¨n H√¨nh h·ªçc vs ƒê·∫°i s·ªë:

    • H√¨nh h·ªçc: Vector l√† m≈©i t√™n c√≥ h∆∞·ªõng v√† ƒë·ªô l·ªõn
    • ƒê·∫°i s·ªë: Vector l√† danh s√°ch c√≥ th·ª© t·ª± c√°c s·ªë th·ª±c

Kh√¥ng gian Vector

  • Kh√¥ng gian Vector (\(\mathbb{R}^n\)): ƒê√¢y l√† t·∫≠p h·ª£p t·∫•t c·∫£ c√°c vector c√≥ th·ªÉ c√≥ \(n\) th√†nh ph·∫ßn (s·ªë). V√≠ d·ª•, \(\mathbb{R}^2\) bao g·ªìm t·∫•t c·∫£ vector 2 th√†nh ph·∫ßn, bi·ªÉu di·ªÖn t·∫•t c·∫£ c√°c ƒëi·ªÉm ho·∫∑c m≈©i t√™n trong m·∫∑t ph·∫≥ng 2D.

  • V√≠ d·ª•:

    • \(\mathbb{R}^2 = \left\{\begin{pmatrix} x \\ y \end{pmatrix} : x, y \in \mathbb{R}\right\}\) (m·∫∑t ph·∫≥ng)
    • \(\mathbb{R}^3 = \left\{\begin{pmatrix} x \\ y \\ z \end{pmatrix} : x, y, z \in \mathbb{R}\right\}\) (kh√¥ng gian 3D)

C√°c Ph√©p to√°n Vector

Ph√©p C·ªông Vector: \(\mathbf{u} + \mathbf{v} = \begin{pmatrix} u_1 \\ u_2 \\ \vdots \\ u_n \end{pmatrix} + \begin{pmatrix} v_1 \\ v_2 \\ \vdots \\ v_n \end{pmatrix} = \begin{pmatrix} u_1 + v_1 \\ u_2 + v_2 \\ \vdots \\ u_n + v_n \end{pmatrix}\)

Ph√©p Nh√¢n V√¥ h∆∞·ªõng: \(c\mathbf{v} = c \begin{pmatrix} v_1 \\ v_2 \\ \vdots \\ v_n \end{pmatrix} = \begin{pmatrix} cv_1 \\ cv_2 \\ \vdots \\ cv_n \end{pmatrix}\)

ƒê·ªôc l·∫≠p Tuy·∫øn t√≠nh, C∆° s·ªü, v√† Chi·ªÅu

ƒê·ªôc l·∫≠p Tuy·∫øn t√≠nh

M·ªôt t·∫≠p h·ª£p vector \(\{\mathbf{v}_1, \mathbf{v}_2, \ldots, \mathbf{v}_k\}\) l√† ƒë·ªôc l·∫≠p tuy·∫øn t√≠nh n·∫øu nghi·ªám duy nh·∫•t c·ªßa:

\[c_1\mathbf{v}_1 + c_2\mathbf{v}_2 + \cdots + c_k\mathbf{v}_k = \mathbf{0}\]

l√† \(c_1 = c_2 = \cdots = c_k = 0\).

Hi·ªÉu bi·∫øt Tr·ª±c quan: M·ªôt t·∫≠p h·ª£p vector ‚Äúƒë·ªôc l·∫≠p tuy·∫øn t√≠nh‚Äù n·∫øu kh√¥ng c√≥ vector n√†o trong t·∫≠p c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c t·∫°o ra b·∫±ng c√°ch chia t·ª∑ l·ªá v√† c·ªông c√°c vector kh√°c trong t·∫≠p. T·∫•t c·∫£ ch√∫ng ƒë·ªÅu ch·ªâ theo c√°c h∆∞·ªõng ‚Äúƒë·ªß kh√°c nhau‚Äù.

V√≠ d·ª• trong \(\mathbb{R}^2\):

  • \(\mathbf{v}_1 = \begin{pmatrix} 1 \\ 0 \end{pmatrix}\) v√† \(\mathbf{v}_2 = \begin{pmatrix} 0 \\ 1 \end{pmatrix}\) l√† ƒë·ªôc l·∫≠p tuy·∫øn t√≠nh
  • \(\mathbf{v}_1 = \begin{pmatrix} 1 \\ 2 \end{pmatrix}\) v√† \(\mathbf{v}_2 = \begin{pmatrix} 2 \\ 4 \end{pmatrix}\) l√† ph·ª• thu·ªôc tuy·∫øn t√≠nh (v√¨ \(\mathbf{v}_2 = 2\mathbf{v}_1\))

C∆° s·ªü

M·ªôt c∆° s·ªü cho m·ªôt kh√¥ng gian vector l√† m·ªôt t·∫≠p h·ª£p t·ªëi thi·ªÉu c√°c vector ƒë·ªôc l·∫≠p tuy·∫øn t√≠nh c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c k·∫øt h·ª£p (chia t·ª∑ l·ªá v√† c·ªông) ƒë·ªÉ t·∫°o ra b·∫•t k·ª≥ vector n√†o kh√°c trong kh√¥ng gian ƒë√≥. N√≥ gi·ªëng nh∆∞ m·ªôt t·∫≠p h·ª£p c√°c kh·ªëi x√¢y d·ª±ng c∆° b·∫£n.

T√≠nh ch·∫•t c·ªßa m·ªôt C∆° s·ªü:

  1. C√°c vector ƒë·ªôc l·∫≠p tuy·∫øn t√≠nh
  2. Ch√∫ng sinh ra to√†n b·ªô kh√¥ng gian vector
  3. M·ªçi vector trong kh√¥ng gian c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c vi·∫øt duy nh·∫•t nh∆∞ m·ªôt t·ªï h·ª£p tuy·∫øn t√≠nh c·ªßa c√°c vector c∆° s·ªü

C∆° s·ªü Chu·∫©n cho \(\mathbb{R}^n\): \(\mathbf{e}_1 = \begin{pmatrix} 1 \\ 0 \\ \vdots \\ 0 \end{pmatrix}, \mathbf{e}_2 = \begin{pmatrix} 0 \\ 1 \\ \vdots \\ 0 \end{pmatrix}, \ldots, \mathbf{e}_n = \begin{pmatrix} 0 \\ 0 \\ \vdots \\ 1 \end{pmatrix}\)

Chi·ªÅu

Chi·ªÅu c·ªßa m·ªôt kh√¥ng gian vector ƒë∆°n gi·∫£n l√† s·ªë l∆∞·ª£ng vector trong b·∫•t k·ª≥ c∆° s·ªü n√†o c·ªßa n√≥. N√≥ cho b·∫°n bi·∫øt c·∫ßn bao nhi√™u h∆∞·ªõng ƒë·ªôc l·∫≠p ƒë·ªÉ m√¥ t·∫£ kh√¥ng gian.

  • \[\dim(\mathbb{R}^2) = 2\]
  • \[\dim(\mathbb{R}^3) = 3\]
  • \[\dim(\mathbb{R}^n) = n\]

Chu·∫©n c·ªßa Vector

Chu·∫©n l√† m·ªôt h√†m g√°n ‚Äúƒë·ªô d√†i‚Äù ho·∫∑c ‚Äúk√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc‚Äù cho m·ªôt vector. N√≥ t·ªïng qu√°t h√≥a kh√°i ni·ªám kho·∫£ng c√°ch t·ª´ g·ªëc t·ªça ƒë·ªô.

T√≠nh ch·∫•t c·ªßa Chu·∫©n

B·∫•t k·ª≥ chu·∫©n \(\|\cdot\|\) n√†o c≈©ng ph·∫£i th·ªèa m√£n ba t√≠nh ch·∫•t:

  1. Kh√¥ng √¢m: \(\|\mathbf{x}\| \geq 0\), v√† \(\|\mathbf{x}\| = 0\) khi v√† ch·ªâ khi \(\mathbf{x} = \mathbf{0}\)
  2. ƒê·ªìng nh·∫•t: $$|t\mathbf{x}| = t |\mathbf{x}|\(v·ªõi b·∫•t k·ª≥ v√¥ h∆∞·ªõng\)t$$
  3. B·∫•t ƒë·∫≥ng th·ª©c Tam gi√°c: \(\|\mathbf{x} + \mathbf{y}\| \leq \|\mathbf{x}\| + \|\mathbf{y}\|\)

C√°c Chu·∫©n Th√¥ng d·ª•ng

Chu·∫©n Euclid (Chu·∫©n L2): \(\|\mathbf{x}\|_2 = \sqrt{\sum_{i=1}^n x_i^2} = \sqrt{x_1^2 + x_2^2 + \cdots + x_n^2}\)

ƒê√¢y l√† kho·∫£ng c√°ch ‚Äúth√¥ng th∆∞·ªùng‚Äù m√† ch√∫ng ta quen thu·ªôc.

Chu·∫©n Manhattan (Chu·∫©n L1): \(\|\mathbf{x}\|_1 = \sum_{i=1}^n |x_i| = |x_1| + |x_2| + \cdots + |x_n|\)

C√≤n ƒë∆∞·ª£c g·ªçi l√† ‚Äúchu·∫©n taxi‚Äù - kho·∫£ng c√°ch m√† m·ªôt chi·∫øc taxi s·∫Ω ƒëi trong th√†nh ph·ªë c√≥ b·ªë c·ª•c d·∫°ng l∆∞·ªõi.

Chu·∫©n T·ªëi ƒëa (Chu·∫©n L‚àû): \(\|\mathbf{x}\|_\infty = \max_{i} |x_i|\)

Th√†nh ph·∫ßn l·ªõn nh·∫•t theo gi√° tr·ªã tuy·ªát ƒë·ªëi.

V√≠ d·ª•: V·ªõi \(\mathbf{x} = \begin{pmatrix} 3 \\ -4 \\ 1 \end{pmatrix}\):

  • \[\|\mathbf{x}\|_2 = \sqrt{3^2 + (-4)^2 + 1^2} = \sqrt{26} \approx 5.1\]
  • \[\|\mathbf{x}\|_1 = |3| + |-4| + |1| = 8\]
  • \[\|\mathbf{x}\|_\infty = \max\{|3|, |-4|, |1|\} = 4\]

T√≠ch V√¥ h∆∞·ªõng (T√≠ch Ch·∫•m)

T√≠ch ch·∫•m (ho·∫∑c t√≠ch v√¥ h∆∞·ªõng) l√† c√°ch ph·ªï bi·∫øn nh·∫•t ƒë·ªÉ nh√¢n hai vector, t·∫°o ra k·∫øt qu·∫£ v√¥ h∆∞·ªõng.

ƒê·ªãnh nghƒ©a

V·ªõi hai vector \(\mathbf{x}\) v√† \(\mathbf{y}\) trong \(\mathbb{R}^n\):

\[\mathbf{x}^T \mathbf{y} = \mathbf{x} \cdot \mathbf{y} = \sum_{i=1}^n x_i y_i = x_1 y_1 + x_2 y_2 + \cdots + x_n y_n\]

Di·ªÖn gi·∫£i H√¨nh h·ªçc

\[\mathbf{x} \cdot \mathbf{y} = \|\mathbf{x}\| \|\mathbf{y}\| \cos \theta\]

trong ƒë√≥ \(\theta\) l√† g√≥c gi·ªØa c√°c vector.

T√≠nh ch·∫•t

  1. Giao ho√°n: \(\mathbf{x} \cdot \mathbf{y} = \mathbf{y} \cdot \mathbf{x}\)
  2. Ph√¢n ph·ªëi: \(\mathbf{x} \cdot (\mathbf{y} + \mathbf{z}) = \mathbf{x} \cdot \mathbf{y} + \mathbf{x} \cdot \mathbf{z}\)
  3. ƒê·ªìng nh·∫•t: \((c\mathbf{x}) \cdot \mathbf{y} = c(\mathbf{x} \cdot \mathbf{y})\)

Tr∆∞·ªùng h·ª£p ƒê·∫∑c bi·ªát

  • Vector tr·ª±c giao: \(\mathbf{x} \cdot \mathbf{y} = 0\) (vu√¥ng g√≥c)
  • Vector song song: \(\mathbf{x} \cdot \mathbf{y} = \pm \|\mathbf{x}\| \|\mathbf{y}\|\)
  • T√≠ch ch·∫•m b·∫£n th√¢n: \(\mathbf{x} \cdot \mathbf{x} = \|\mathbf{x}\|_2^2\)

V√≠ d·ª•

V·ªõi \(\mathbf{x} = \begin{pmatrix} 1 \\ 2 \end{pmatrix}\) v√† \(\mathbf{y} = \begin{pmatrix} 3 \\ 4 \end{pmatrix}\):

\[\mathbf{x}^T \mathbf{y} = (1)(3) + (2)(4) = 3 + 8 = 11\]

·ª®ng d·ª•ng trong T·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a

Hi·ªÉu v·ªÅ vector v√† kh√¥ng gian vector l√† r·∫•t quan tr·ªçng cho t·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a v√¨:

  1. Bi·∫øn Quy·∫øt ƒë·ªãnh: C√°c b√†i to√°n t·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a th∆∞·ªùng li√™n quan ƒë·∫øn vi·ªác t√¨m gi√° tr·ªã t·ªët nh·∫•t cho nhi·ªÅu bi·∫øn, ƒë∆∞·ª£c bi·ªÉu di·ªÖn t·ª± nhi√™n nh∆∞ vector.

  2. Gradient: Gradient c·ªßa m·ªôt h√†m l√† m·ªôt vector ch·ªâ theo h∆∞·ªõng tƒÉng d·ªëc nh·∫•t.

  3. R√†ng bu·ªôc: R√†ng bu·ªôc tuy·∫øn t√≠nh trong t·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë∆∞·ª£c bi·ªÉu di·ªÖn b·∫±ng t√≠ch ch·∫•m: \(\mathbf{a}^T \mathbf{x} \leq b\).

  4. Kho·∫£ng c√°ch v√† ƒê·ªô t∆∞∆°ng t·ª±: C√°c chu·∫©n kh√°c nhau cung c·∫•p c√°c c√°ch kh√°c nhau ƒë·ªÉ ƒëo kho·∫£ng c√°ch gi·ªØa c√°c nghi·ªám ho·∫∑c k√≠ch th∆∞·ªõc c·ªßa c√°c thay ƒë·ªïi.

  5. T√≠nh tr·ª±c giao: Nhi·ªÅu kh√°i ni·ªám t·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a d·ª±a v√†o t√≠nh vu√¥ng g√≥c, ch·∫≥ng h·∫°n nh∆∞ m·ªëi quan h·ªá gi·ªØa gradient v√† ƒë∆∞·ªùng m·ª©c.

  6. T·ªï h·ª£p Tuy·∫øn t√≠nh: V√πng kh·∫£ thi th∆∞·ªùng ƒë∆∞·ª£c ƒë·ªãnh nghƒ©a nh∆∞ t·ªï h·ª£p tuy·∫øn t√≠nh c·ªßa vector (bao l·ªìi, h√¨nh n√≥n, v.v.).

Khung kh√¥ng gian vector cung c·∫•p n·ªÅn t·∫£ng to√°n h·ªçc ƒë·ªÉ x√¢y d·ª±ng v√† gi·∫£i quy·∫øt c√°c b√†i to√°n t·ªëi ∆∞u h√≥a m·ªôt c√°ch c√≥ h·ªá th·ªëng.
